title: Jacob Rees-Mogg – 2022 Comments on Prime Minister not Going to COP
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jacob Rees-Mogg, the MP for North East Somerset, on Twitter on 28 October 2022.
content:
The Prime Minister is right not to go to COP. The cost of living won’t be solved in Sharm el Sheikh where each hotel room for the conference is £2,000 a night.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
